name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blue Bird - Give my bird for Twitter back

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome back the Twitter Blue Bird. Brings back old design and logo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Add ✅ this extension to your Chrome browser and forget about new Twitter X-design. Blue Bird is an extension for those who don't like new design of Twitter and would like to see beloved 💟 and pretty Twitter Bird.

User guide:👋🏻👋🏻👋🏻
Click ➕Add to Chrome and reload your current Twitter page. After this the extension will automatically change new design to old one. No other user actions needed.😌

This is something you were looking for Enjoy!🥹
